content:
### EXISTING STRUCTURES

### Electricity generator at position(0, 0)
Consists of steam engine (position 0, 0), boiler (position 0, 0) and offshore pump (position 0, 0).

### Copper plate mine at position(0, 0)
Consists of following entities
- Burner mining drill (position 0, 0) and a furnace at position (0, 0)
- Burner mining drill (position 5, 5) and a furnace at position (5, 5)

### Copper cable factory at position(0, 0)
Consists of following entities
- Assembling machine at position (0, 0) and inserter at position (0, 0) that puts into assembling machine
- Beltgroup (position 0, 0) that connects the furnace at position (0, 0) to assembling machine at position (0, 0)

### Small Electric Pole at position(-9.5, 0.5)
Consists of a small electric pole (position -9.5, 0.5) that provides power to nearby structures.

### Lab at position(5, 5)
Consists of a lab (position 5, 5) that is currently not powered.

### Copper cable factory
Consists of following entities
- Assembling machine at position (0, 0) and inserter at position (0, 0) that puts into assembling machine
- Beltgroup (position 0, 0) that connects the furnace at position (0, 0) to assembling machine at position (0, 0)

### ERROR TIPS

### Errors when placing into a tile which is occupied by another entity
- Ensure you can place an entity to a tile before attempting placing.

### Errors related to power supply
- Ensure that all structures requiring power are connected to an electricity source. Check the status of the lab which is currently showing "NO POWER". 

### Errors when using extracting but being too far
- Make sure to move to the target entity where you want to extract from before extracting items. 

### General crafting errors
- Ensure you have the necessary ingredients in your inventory before attempting to craft items.
